# Sustainable Shopping – Eco-Friendly, Fair Trade Clothing, Shoes & More

## Description

With a DoneGood gift card your giftee can shop thousands of unique and purposeful goods—and know that no matter what they choose, they’re doing good for the planet and for the person who made their gift.
If you know someone really nice who likes to do good, you can send them a DoneGood gift card and…
